Carpenter Login A Login Template illustrating login best practices in Android development Continue with Twitter Continue with Google Continue with Phone Continue with Facebook A verification code will be sent to your phone. Sign Up with Email Sign Up Sign In Forgot password? Don\'t have Account? Sign up instead. Recover your Account A Password reset Email will be sent to your email to set a new Password. Send Email sent successfully! Log in with Phone Verify your Number Didn\'t receive Code? Send again. Verify Verification Code You are offline! Code sent to %s Log out Cancel Cancel Phone Login? Dismiss Retry Send code again? Verify your Email A verification Email was sent to your Email I didn\'t receive a Verification Email Cancel Login? Send Email again? Too many requests may result in your account being unable to send requests for a while! Not verified! Check the link sent to your Email Verification Email sent successfully! Something went wrong! Cancel sending Email? Cancel signing up? Or Register Log In Welcome This is a login template created by @ameencarpenter
Email* Password* Confirm Password* Phone Number*
Phone number is required! Not a valid Number! Passwords don\'t match! Password confirmation is required! Email is required! Not a valid Email! Verification code is required! At least 6 characters! Password is required!
